class_notes: This course builds on the tools and concepts of painting. This course incorporates intermediate levels of conceptual and aesthetic awareness, creative problem-solving, aesthetics, and critical thinking, with an emphasis on 20th- and 21st-century aesthetic practices.
course_description: This course builds on the tools and concepts of painting. This course incorporates intermediate levels of conceptual and aesthetic awareness, creative problem solving, aesthetics and critical thinking with an emphasis on the 20th and 21st century aesthetic practices.
prerequisites: This course requires ARTVIS 105 or ARTVIS 104 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
